snippet.textDisplay: I like this song, but NOTHING beats the boulder song from Crash Bandicoot 2. Those levels were TERRIFYING and the music was 50% of it. Levels where stuff chases you like the triceratops in 3 aren't the same without that music.

snippet.textDisplay: Spyro, Mario, Crash Bandicoot, Banjo-Kazooie, and Sonic.  What do they all have in common?  Games that used a very simple platforming formula to very great effect.  My suggestion?  Epic platformer battle-royale!  Or EPBR for short.  Not quite as catchy as SSBB.  Or EPA, which would totally shut it down for one modern man causing harm to an endangered species, a bush creature, a symbiotic hybrid, and a rarely-seen-running breed of mammal.
snippet.textOriginal: Spyro, Mario, Crash Bandicoot, Banjo-Kazooie, and Sonic.  What do they all have in common?  Games that used a very simple platforming formula to very great effect.  My suggestion?  Epic platformer battle-royale!  Or EPBR for short.  Not quite as catchy as SSBB.  Or EPA, which would totally shut it down for one modern man causing harm to an endangered species, a bush creature, a symbiotic hybrid, and a rarely-seen-running breed of mammal.

snippet.textDisplay:
Oh Crash...you are the very personification of my carefree youth now totally gone and forgotten.
I met a lot of good people through this guy. (IRL) Now that he's been reduced to crappy game status he's lost his charm like I lost many of these friends I met.
Sad sad times.....But good music still carries on.

snippet.textDisplay:
It's tough to say Crash was Sony's mascot back in the day since Sony had so many damn mascots...
Crash Bandicoot
Spyro The Dragon
Solid Snake
Lara Croft
Cloud Strife
PaRappa The Rapper
Sweet Tooth
Sony's always been confusing on the topic, what with also having  later with PS2 Sora, Jak & Daxter, Ratchet & Clank, Kratos, Dante, & Sly Cooper. And NOW we also have to the list Nathan Drake, Sack Boy, Nathan Cole, Helghast, & Zack Fair.
MAKE UP YOUR MIND SONY. WHO IS YOUR MASCOT?
snippet.textOriginal:
It's tough to say Crash was Sony's mascot back in the day since Sony had so many damn mascots...
Crash Bandicoot
Spyro The Dragon
Solid Snake
Lara Croft
Cloud Strife
PaRappa The Rapper
Sweet Tooth
Sony's always been confusing on the topic, what with also having  later with PS2 Sora, Jak & Daxter, Ratchet & Clank, Kratos, Dante, & Sly Cooper. And NOW we also have to the list Nathan Drake, Sack Boy, Nathan Cole, Helghast, & Zack Fair.
MAKE UP YOUR MIND SONY. WHO IS YOUR MASCOT?
